title: Blinis with smoked salmon pâté, mackerel and a beetroot and shallot pickle
description: Rich smoked salmon is perfectly balance with earthy beetroot and sharp pickles in this dish that is sure to impress.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ bunch baby heritage beetroots, cleaned, small stalk left on
4 mackerel fillets, filleted, pin boned, skin on
